name: ADXRunner
description:
In ADXRunner you will take on the role of a criminal in a high security prison.

Your goal? To get out of the prison while making as much carnage as possible!

To do this you can use different types of cards, which can be found on the enemies or simply on the ground.

As the game is a prototype, it lacks many features.

So we made a list of inputs to help you in your experience :

  • Scroll Up/Down : Change card type
  • WASD : Movements
  • Space : Jump
  • Shift : Race
  • E: Bullet Time
  • Backspace : Return to the menus

If you encounter any problem you can report it to our email address :

support@ogmastudio.fr

If you want to meet us or contact us you can do it at this email address :

contact@ogmastudio.fr

A discord server is also available for the community as well as many other networks :

https://discord.gg/BJtJq4Rm2y
